document.full_text: jaromir jagr, who has led the czech republic as it chases a second straight world title, is mulling his professional options after finishing his third season in russia.
document.title: jagr's return to form fuels speculation of n.h.l. return
lines_and_colors: jaromir jagr, who has led the czech republic as it chases a second straight world title, is mulling his professional options after finishing his third season in russia.
